ComicInfo.Title: Free Comic Book Day
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jeremy the crow awakes to find that the first big snow of winter arrived while he was sleeping. Oh no! He forgot to fly south! Meanwhile, Peanutbutter is inside enjoying a little cat-nap on a nice warm heater. Doesn’t that seem fundamentally unfair? Jeremy quickly hatches a plan to scam the little cat, but will it work? A great all ages book, fun for young and old alike.
Feature bonus guest strips by Jeff Smith (Bone), Brian Ralph (Cave-In), Jason (Lost Cat), Neil Jam, Tom Devlin and Jeffrey Brown (Darth Vader and Son).
NOTE: This comic (without the covers and guest comics) is collected in Peanutbutter & Jeremy’s Best Book Ever
